item.description:
Knit Pickings in Plaistow will be hosting a Knit In Public gathering from 10-3pm at the Plaistow commons.

I spoke withe the girls at Knit Pickings and found out that they will be doing raffles and have these cute monogrammed KIP bags.

Bathrooms are near by, food I'm not so sure on.

It's about 55 minutes from Dover according to Google.

I'm going, anyone want to come with?
item.how_to_find_us: Let's plan to meet at the Dover HS on route 108, it's on the way to Plaistow.
item.name: WORLD WIDE KNIT IN PUBLIC DAY
